name: functionalism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the principle that the most important thing about an object such as a building is its use rather than what it looks like

Related word
functionalist
Add to word list
Add to word list
the idea that products, organizations, etc. should be designed to be practical and useful: The new anti-consumers are shunning supermarket functionalism in favour of local traders and farmers' markets.
